subject: AI & Agents
title: AI Ethics Review in Product Development
description: A quick, practical guide to AI Ethics Review in Product Development.

hook.text: Your recommendation algorithm boosts engagement but also promotes addictive content.

buildup.text: Ethics reviews evaluate AI features for potential harms before they reach users.

discovery.text: Review questions: who benefits, who's harmed, what if it fails, can users opt out?

twist.text: Ethics reviews slow down shipping. But shipping harmful features slows down trust permanently.

climax.text: Embed ethics checkpoints at design, pre-launch, and post-launch monitoring phases.

punchline.text: Move fast and don't break people.

quiz.question: When should ethics reviews happen?
options: At design, pre-launch, and post-launch phases
